content.detailedDescription: A bright star like object was observed by several of us in the immediate area traveling from the west to the east towards the louisiana border from south of marshall, tx.  looking at the object, the white light was the brightest in the center of it....And the object  had to have had at least 8 or 10 sides on it because of the way the light in the center glowed around the perimeter. there was no sound coming from the object.
content.summary: Star like object observed traveling south of marshall, tx  fm rd 1186

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?

on my back porch smoking a cigarette
 
2. what made you first notice the object?

its bright and stands out, this isn't the first time ive seen it, ive noticed it a handful of times over time usually after the sun goes down until the sun goes up, appears to be random times but always the same direction and object type.
 
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?

honestly i have no idea im ex-us army medic im used to seeing planes and helicopters but this dosent blink or make noise or have any discernible features.
 
4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.

solid light making no sound traveling from west to east at approx. 500 ft - 700ft up never changed direction or appearance. 

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.

not the first time ive seen this, its interesting and would like to figure out what it is.  i lack the equipment to better observe this object and filter out the light its emmiting.
 
6. how did you lose sight of the object?

it just continued east at the same speed and went beyond my sight eventually event lasted around 7 minutes. same as all the other times.
content.summary: Solid lightsource with no sound flying in a straight line.

content.detailedDescription: Orange object flying in formation.  very high and disappeared as they seemed to elevate but there were a considerable amount of clouds that still shouldn't have disguised the flight path so i believe they rose i  altitude and disappeared
content.summary: Strange lights in the sky wich i have never seen before.  m y wife and kid also witness it the lights had a formation and then just elevated and dissapreaed into the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was sleeping i don't know if this happen at night are morning. anyway all of a sudden i awoke. i was in outer space i did not have a body are i did not see a body. but there i was. i done know what was holding me up but felt like i was being held up by something. in my head i was being told not to look to my left. it felt like a being are something was beside me but kept telling me not to look. anyway straight ahead there was earth i was being shown south america for some reason. beyond earth there was the moon. i looked up there were a billion stars as far as i could see. i have seen stars in the sky but not like this. i remember a slight breeze blowing my bangs i dont know where the wind was coming from but it was a slight breeze. when i woke up i was back in my bed and remembered all of the above. everybody i have told has laughed at me. every thing i saw was in color. i dont think you dream in color. if it was a dream it was so vivid that was a year ago. i remembered it as if it was yesterday. i know i felt happy and in awh of the heavens and the earth and moon. beautiful is an understatement. i bet there was more to this but what ever enity wipe out some of my memory and only let me remember this. please dont laugh this is a true story. i will take a polygraph test or be hypnotized. i want to know more myself.

judy
content.summary: I was asleep then woke up in space.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the second floor and the two basketball shape lights were so bright that illuminated about 200 ft the wooded area and when i wanted to see what it was they opened the blind shades one by one to see me in my bed, for some reason i couldn't move but i knew it was not from this world.  i saw a cloud almost invisible at the beginning but then the shape appeared to be a woman like figure with big eyes, i didn't look the eyes and told her to leave me alone and that i couldn't have children any more and didn't want anything with them. but this was very terrifying experience because i couldn't move to run away, then as soon as they left couldn't sleep for weeks, i feel they will come back again no matter where.  i always see ufos in the sky but i do not port a video camera with me right now.  the characteristic is that the lights were amazingly powerful in the dark woods but when observing me the light did not get to the room plus i was with the bathroom light on, but that night i was awake in pain so impossible i had a dream.
content.summary: Two lights over my second window and got paralyzed

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside my house on aug 2. at about 12-1 am, saw hovering above one of the houses, got in my car & started recording.. it was a really bright blue light and seemed to be blinking from blue to purple and back to blue again. the object seemed to be randomly moving back and forth at various speeds, and as it's a bit harder to see in the video, was giving off a very bright light and would change from blue to purple at one point.
content.summary: Ufo sighting orlando florida august 2 2013

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down plainfield pike heading the direction of walmart & saw bright flashing lights hovering along the tree line in a circular shape. i ended up taking the high way and lost sight of the object.
content.summary: Was driving and saw bright lights in a circular shape on the tree line.

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting my ex-wife and daughter at their vacation house in nj. i was up on the deck looking at stars because it was a clear night. we did see some meteors and satellites but this was completely different. 

i went down stairs for a min and then went back up to lay on the lounge chair so i could see as much of the night sky as possible. just as i was about to sit, i looked up and i thought i saw another shooting star but their were 2 and there were going the same speed then passing each other.
almost like they were trying to get away from something, at least that's what i thought at the time. they were a yellowish orange color. i said out loud, "what the f was that?" then i ran down stairs to tell everyone.

this all took place in a matter of 3 to 4 seconds.

i know what i saw and if you told me the same story, i would understand why its so hard to believe but i now know, i yelled, "i saw you...."

anyway, thats all i can tell you.

very sincerely
mike
content.summary: 2 bright orbs moving with purpose, one passing the other then other passes.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My family and i are driving to deception pass here in washington state. we the decide to pull over at a campsite to get eat lunch. a half hour passes and almost time to get back on the road again, until suddenly i notice an orb like structure in the sky. i had then quickly announced what i see and from there we all gazed up at the sky to try and see what i had been describing. we keep our eyes up and notice that something was different. this craft we spotted was something we all have never seen something to this extent. we all saw and it continued to fly around up and down side to side. military planes were present as well with the obvious crackle of speed. we kept seeing this craft flying all over acting as if it were interacting with us all... we then decided to leave and think of this experice as unusual and something out of the ordinary. but we felt that it was definitely something that wasn't military or civilian, it was a ufo and i am a believer as long with the other members of my family. i wish i could express more but my phone is dying... thank you dr. greer for all your great work along with you're great team. i shall keep doing what i can to contact et beings and helping the people of this world realize that we are not alone... thank you for the terrific site of pure truth.
content.distance: 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,   Disc,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Star-like
content.summary: Star like object, moved in rapid speeds, and no apparent direction. pulsated and flew with other craft aware

content.detailedDescription: I saw something very strange last night. i stepped out onto my front porch which faces west to have a smoke. i was looking at all the stars, it was a beautiful clear night, i could see the band of the milky-way directly over head. i was facing west when all of a sudden to my right i saw a very bright white star like ( at first i thought it was a shooting star )  object high up in the sky but not so far away going quite fast from west to east/north east.  i watching it thinking it would burn out or something but it just kept going higher and farther east until it went over the roof line of my house. i then ran inside to the backdoor where we have another porch facing east. i spotted the same unblinking white light again and watched it as it got farther and father away, and it then turned into dark orange colored dot. i watched it as long as i could till it disappeared against the back drop of stars. there were a lot of shooting stars and normal plane traffic that night too.  so i decided to go back out to the front porch again to see if i would see something else. staring up and out to the right, it seemed like all of a sudden to the left side directly over head in the sky was another this time even brighter and bigger object: ( i actually have the feeling that these two sightings may involve only 1 object but i have no way of knowing). it seemed to to be moving slowly at first and it came directly over head much closer than before and i started to get a really good look at this thing. the light on this was so incredibly bright, it seemed to have a lens flare type of brightness the sun has as it moved over head, i had to squint slightly it was so unexpectedly bright but i kept my eyes peeled as much as possible. everything happened pretty fast.  inside this light was a tiny little dark dot in the center.The light looked like it was coming from the "bottom" and this light became an intense ultraviolet white-blue, while it seemed to puff up a little almost like a beam. the dot then looked like it changed into a small outline of an elongated hexagon shape with the light all around and in it. the light source abruptly seemed to flip to the top and it illuminated the  night sky right above itself and around itself a brilliant golden colored bright blue sky like you would see in the day time, but it had a golden unearthly spherical transparent quality to it. then the dot in the center was back with the white/blue light all around it and this object started moving faster out toward the northwest. it kept going out and up into the sky horizon becoming dimmer and then just abruptly became a tiny orange dot that kept following the same direction. i watched this one also "disappear" till it was no longer visible to the naked eye. during these events there was no sounds being emitted my these lights/crafts.I believe whatever these things were, possibly disturbed a large pack of coyotes, because they were howling together to the west much louder than normal shortly before i saw these lights.  i have lived near heavy air traffic areas most of my life, and am pretty familiar with what is 'normal'. i am right next to a military base, and my father was a jet pilot for the navy for 20 years, and my grandparents worked in the airline industry. planes have been a big part of my life. i have never ever seen anything like this before. i have been racking my brain for an explanation, and i really dont have one.  at first i was in total awe, but the more i think about it or try to understand it, the more i find it kind of disturbing than exciting.
content.summary: Very bright light/craft. 2 sightings within minutes of each other

content.detailedDescription: Me and 3 friends were out at deer flat just looking at the stars when we realized that there was a ufo flying in the sky. we knew this because it was moving faster than the rest of the air planes that were in the air and it only emitted one bright light that pulsed a few times randomly as it was going across the sky. it would move in a straight line then slow down abruptly like it was hovering then it would go again, sometimes in a different direction than it was originally headed in. it pulsed like two or three times and each time it would only be 3-5 seconds before it would turn on again, until it eventually disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Me and 3 friends were out there looking at the stars when we realized that we something flying in the sky that wasn't an air plane. we knew this because it was moving faster than the rest of the air planes that were in the air and it only emitted one brig

content.detailedDescription: I was taking nature photos. i snapped several pictures of a small pond on route 40. was located between the towns of clark center and martinsville, illinois in clark county, between noon-1:00 p.M. i saw nothing whatsoever with the naked eye. when i uploaded the pictures onto the computer, i saw an object above the pond, above the treeline. cigar shaped, gold/copper colored, with black as well. it was not a bird, as i've taken many pictures of birds in flight with my olympus camera. at no time did i ever see the object with the naked eye, nor did i hear a noise.
content.summary: Object appeared in photograph. not visible to naked eye.

content.detailedDescription: Parecia una estrella pero con mas luz y decide fotografiar.
content.summary: Vi luces parecida a una estrella durante el dia llamo mi atencion-

content.detailedDescription: I was turning off the pool lights at approximately 2130 hrs when i noticed three reddish orange circles traveling from nw to se.  the first three were either flying in formation or on a fixed object.  the next two followed in what appeared to be equally spaced distance.  they traveled nw to se for approximately 2minutes, stopped and blinked out one at a time.  they lit up again 1-2 minutes later and then blinked out again.  i checked the sky and i could see high altitude planes flying and there was nothing similar.  the next day i saw small aircraft from smith field and at a height considerably higher than the lights i could hear the motors clearly.  i called the local police department and nobody reported seeing what i saw.  today i called the local guard base and again nothing.
content.summary: Lights in the night sky

content.detailedDescription: Front yard. 11:30 am 8-5-2013. disc objects gold in color over my sky. happens everyday. it is a not zone that's all i can say. you got to look at the footage.
content.features: Dome,  Window(s),  Patterned Surface,  Other,  Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,   Cross,   Diamond,   Disc,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Scary. all to real. i have a lot of footage and hard proof.  happen's very day. always during the day. picture and video quality unbelievable.

content.detailedDescription: I was in a walmart parking lot and saw a sunset i wanted as a wallpaper,after the shot i started to zoom and crop. the object grew as a zoomed,nothing i have ever seen before,at first i thought it was dirt,but ruled it out quick as i noticed shape and hole in object,by the time i had noticed it on phone it was gone,this was an hour before an unexpected storm showed up,note the forming clouds.
content.summary: Caught on cellphone while taking random pic for wallpaper

content.detailedDescription:
1. where and what i was doing? 
well, my wife and i sit on our swing at night after the kids are tucked in. we leave the windows open so we can here them if something is wrong. we love the fresh maine air at night. we even do this during the winter but get bundled up. the sky is so clear so we try to find the different constellations and such. we sit out there for hours.
2. what made you first notice the object?
my wife and i have seen these multiple times in the past few years, they have just showed up and seemed to stick around. we noticed them by looking at the stars. we saw something odd that didnt make since.
3. when we first started seeing these things we thought they were just stars but the movement of them seem to have a purpose.
4. the objects and its actions/motions.
well they look exactly like stars, they will be stationary but then either speed off or just plug along real slow. some move light year fast like cover the entire night sky in a matter of seconds not minutes. but there is not a trail like from a falling star. they almost seem to communicate with each other. at first we thought maybe satellites, but no. my wife downloaded a satellite app on her phone and computer. when we see these objects there is not a satellite even near. we see these ever night. we have also noticed them being hooked together with a beam of light as well. some will flash a gold colored light and the others in the area will zoom off really fast or just stop and stay there. i dont think satellites can do that. this has been going on since 2009. we just wanna know what is going on and what they are. we see at least 30 every night we go out there.
5. our reactions and feelings during this.
we are not really scared but more amazed than anything. we really need to know what these things are. we have tried our self and cant figure it out. we need someone who knows more about whats out there for help. we also have seen football field sized crafts on several different occasions. they were all black sounded all move like the movie transformers, that machine like sound. some didnt even make any noises at all but some were lit up and it rattled our windows when it went over head. some we could look right into the craft they were so low. we didnt see any beings or anything but we could look in side and it was all lit up like a shopping mall in side. if it was only me i would think i was crazy but my wife and others have seen them as well. everyone at first think were nuts then they come see for them self and are amazed just like us. 
6. how did we loose sight of the object.
some just stick around while others vanish in mid air or they zoom off over the horizon. we never really loose sight of them because there always there. some one we need help, come take a look for your self. i promise you will see them. just let us know what these things are and get our questions answered.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: Star like objects flying in all directions. they fly at each other and get really bright then race away. ome would stop and stay

content.detailedDescription: I was driving thru country and needed gas. i stopped at a country store and began pumping fuel. suddenly, i see what i initially think is a firework descend in the horizon.  it was an object traveling in a westward direction and descending rapidly. it started off with kind of a pink glow that changed to green then at the end it had turned to a white globe then it dissiipated with a white flash. i knew at once that it was too close and too large to be a falling star or comet, that's why i initially thought it was a firework. i just stood there dumb founded for about five minutes, looked around too see if anyone else saw it it but to no avail. it reminded me of another ufo i saw several years before but that one had an immense green flash that covered the horizon. i had a very eerie feeling and actually felt a heat flash with nausea. i got in the car and continued toward town on the darkening highway. they're we're very strange cloud formations in the sky or maybe it was just enhanced because of what i saw. at any rate, i found this anomaly serious enough to report it.
content.summary: Light, too close for falling star, descends in west. projecting color trail that changes and ends in a  flash.

content.detailedDescription: Evening dinner in backyard. we live south and east of metro airport and are familiar with aircraft and flight paths.......Can hear jets when wind is right. noticed bright red orb traveling from west to east (toward us)it was south of the airport boundry and was not following any flight path seen in many years of living near and around this airport. both my wife and i noticed right away it was unusual... it appeared to be climbing and there were no navigation light or strobes. a second orb appeared in trail of the first one and appeared to follow about one half mile behind. neither orb made any sound. the lead object turned smoothly 90 degrees to the south and climbed into the clouds, the second object followed the same path but not as smoothly and appeared to hover brifly and then climbed away as the other. bright red glow of orb shaped light with a yellow tinge to the edges. no visible shape, no sound at all....I have never been this close to a flying object that made no sound. i have been around aviation all my life and never saw anything like this. for all i know it was a drone or man made object. but for both my wife and i this qualifies as an unidentified flying object(s).
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two glowing red orbs flying in trail approached from west climbing and then turned south 90 degrees and climbesd into clouds

content.detailedDescription:
On my back deck, noticed a bright something thru the tree leaves to my left(se) i then went
n. to the front yard for better look and saw a ball? donut? bright orange and yellow object
with 3 distinct color bands ...Center pale orange...Surounded by a more intense ring of
brighter orange that seem to flowing w/ what looked like a river of varying orange ripples like
disturbed water would look like. the outer ring was a yellow radiant spoke-like appearance
w/ the spokes close together.  it was coming towards slowly(heading due north) and i could
see it very clearly. at this point i darted into the house and grabbed my binocs (7x30) and
continued to observe the object thru them. at this point the o made a gradual turn to the e.
not changing speed. i watched it for appr. 1 min. as it continued e. til the tree line obscured
my veiw.  i then looked to where first saw it from the front yard and saw a second identical
object following the same path as the first.  the second one however did not disappear in
the same manner as the first but as it came to the tree line it grew smaller and rose steadily
til it went out of sight. (i guess-timate a45deg. angle). accurate sketch available if needed.
incidenndly i was able to contact my son by cphone at the time and he was on his way home
on the road the objects seemed to to be traveling above but he reported he could not see
them.  for a size comparison they looked to be the size of a bb gun bb held at arms length.
content.summary: Curved flt. path 2objs same path 2min. apart brite orange circle(donut) multi orange/yellow

content.detailedDescription:
I was letting my dogs out and i happened to look at the sky and i saw big dipper and little dipper then this what appeared to be a star went by the big dipper then through the littel dipper blinked and went across the sky
then up and down then appeared to go decend straight down towards the ocean as i live by the hyannis harbor. it was silent, i commented to myself
what the hell is that that woke my daughter who it first th0ught it was
a comet or falling star but they way it moved it could have not been, 
i call my local airport and they had no reports and not sure where i should
report so i am reporting it to you. not sure what it was, but i made me
feel uneasy.
content.summary: Looked like star but went across the sky blinked then up and down then desending down until; out of my eye sight call the locay airport down plans or sightings

content.detailedDescription: I believe this event to be the same one described in other report, as it was spotted by me around that time and date, and the previous description fits what i saw exactly as described.  i witnessed event over the gravel pit at intersections of clear lake rd and harvey lake rd.   orb shaped object pulsates in intensity and color, hovering, then quickly sped through the sky from a north to south (roughly) flight path.  i believe that i was witness to event posted  on mufon previously reported this year, and i personally believe the information from that poster to be exactly what i witnessed.  though not immediatly spotted afterwards that  night, unmarked black helicopters have been observed multiple times  at altitudes appearing to be under 500 ft.   helicopters usually make multiple passes and are completely unmarked.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red-orange orb shaped object over gravel pit

content.detailedDescription:
Driving west down 50 hwy, i had seen a bright light to the north of the highway. i kept looking at it. it looked like a search light at first but was not moving, it was getting brighter and more pronounced into a triangle shape (with three lights). there was a lighter colored object to the west side of the light that also became a 3 lighted triangle. (my friend that was driving also saw the lights after i had mentioned something.)

these two objects were hovering. 

the lights began to fade one after another after a good 3 minutes and small violet/blue objects shot off and headed west in a straight line. the very last violet/blue light was quickly flying around the other lights.

there was no sound, nothing else in the air at the time.
content.summary: 6 lights formed two triangle shapes- fading into small violet/blue objects heading west.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the roof of a hotel relaxing and talking with two lady friends, facing nw. they sat across the table from me.  suddenly i spotted a bright orange light about 45 deg above the horizon and moving toward us.  it moved slowly, so at first i thought it was a helicopter, but there was no noise at all.  generally the only aircraft we see in the sky over nazareth are either military jets or helicopters, but they bear conventional lights, which this object did not. i got the impression that it had some kind of structure, as the light was not round or symmetric. it grew brighter, even quite bright,  as it passed overhead maybe 500 ft up. it then passed through 90 degrees or straight over us to the se.  before it was occluded by the higher structure of the hotel roof behind me it faded out. i was quite calm at first until i realized it had no green or red light and therefore was not a jet or helicopter.  then i was suddenly excited (but tried to remain subdued) and called my friends attention to the light.  they both turned around and looked up and saw it and asked, "what is it?" they suggested "airplane" or "helicopter", but i pointed out that nothing that flies at night over israel  is orange.  also nothing in the sky simply fades out. i was disturbed when it faded out, for nothing that i know does that. i had no good explanation for what we saw. i never thought of taking a photo with my israeli cell phone, which can do that, but in low quality. i still have no explanation for the light or for my own inability to think of photographing it.
content.summary: A bright orange light appeared at about 45 deg above horizon and moved se silently then faded away≥

content.detailedDescription:
After all others of camping slept away, 2 discs, bright white hoverd with no noise above me between the trees over the lake. one seem nearer other farer cause one was huge but both same whote disc shape from under them and they flew in formation.
hole event lasted for me only a few moments not more than 30 seconds, they few very slow, slower than every plane at the evening whitch was then mutch more far away, the 2 discs where bright white, no pulsing, no colorchange.
content.summary: 2 discs - white in formatione over the mggel lake

content.detailedDescription: This is the first odd sighting i have ever observed so please forgive the lacking vocabulary for the subject matter. at shortly after 5:00 am i stepped outside my home to take in fresh air. i noticed movement above the horizon to the north east on a semi-clear dark early morning (still very dark). since the moving object was unusually bright and larger than the outline of a jet i waited to hear some sound or identifying standard faa blinking lights. when there were neither blinking lights or any sound i presumed it to be possibly a satellite. when the solid bright object clearly moved into one of two scattered clouds above me and back out again i began to observe it more closely. it's movement was not constant but rather halting. speeding up and slowing down in a straight line. based on the cloud ceiling of about 10,000 ft and the size of the object it was very large, possibly 500 ft in diameter or larger. since we are in a rural area it was an extremely quite night with dark skies the object clearly made no sound and was within our atmosphere. i observed no other object in the sky or sound from any other commonly known aircraft. i did not attempt to signal or flash the object nor did i move. the object move visibly across the entire visible horizon soundless.
content.summary: Observed a silent object moving across the sky at approx 8000 ft

content.detailedDescription:
my boyfriend and i were coming home from the fair. it was about 9:30pm sat aug 3 2013. we were on i 96 going west. we had just passed the grand river exit to my right i seen several small lights in the sky below the clouds. i told my boyfriend to look and ask him what they were. he looked up and seen them too. there were small lights a lot of them. they were like side by side kind of in a row. there were 2 groups of them. in the first group i would say there was about 30 of them. then there was a space between them and in the 2nd group was a lot more about 50 or 60. they seemed to be moving but slow. then there was a small curve and there were behind us. i kept looking back to watch them. they looked like they were coming from dewitt and they were going south. i was going to get off on m 100 take pics but when i looked back i didn't see them any more. we didn't no what it was really. then my boyfriend said that it probably was military helicopters flying to the armey national guard base on m100. i told him i didn't think so but if they were helicopters, i didn't think they would all fit on that field.    
   i didn't no what it was so i just went along with what he said.
content.summary: Two groups of lights in the sky side by side about 100 of them going south then outr of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
On early saturday morning, i would say around 1 or 2am, i found myself awaken by a loud noise and the sound of my mothers dogs barking. i was in the room asleep with my son, cousin, aunt and uncle. i payed no attention to the noise since it's not unusual to hear them when you have pets in the house. what really made me wake up was the fact that i saw a light appear in the room. a very bright light. i opened my eyes thinking at first it was a family member looking for something, but what i saw really scared me.

at the foot of the bed where i was standing there was a black entity scanning the room with what i think was a flashlight, at first i thought it was an intruder (human) but then i saw it's head, and it was not a human head. it had a long round jaw and a big round black eye (seen in side view)it was scanning the room as if it was looking for something or someone, but it wasn't moving it was just standing there, when it notice i opened my eyes it flashed the light towards me and blinded me, i couldn't open my eyes at all no matter how hard i tried. i was obviously scared and attempted to wake up my aunt who was sleeping next to me but had no luck in doing so. this lasted for what ?I think was about 30seconds to a minute. the light then disappeared and once i was able to see again i noticed there was no one there. i was extremely scared and my first reaction was to check if my son was still next to me, which he was. i held him tighter got under the covers and went back to bed.

the following day i mentioned the experience to my family, but no one heard or saw anything. i want to believe it was just a dream, but this is the second time an experience like this has happened to me.
content.summary: Entity at foot of bed scaning the room with some kind of light

content.detailedDescription: While sitting outside smoking i had seen two extremely fast moving lights really high, most likely higher then the clouds. after they faded away another light about the same distance flew by and turned extremely fast, way to fast for the speed it was going and then slowly faded away also. before and after i witnessed the lights i had seen a few different types of  commercial aircraft flying by at different altitudes which is common in this area. seeing those aircrafts gave me perspective on the speed,  maneuverability and altitude of the lights which made me assume they were not of this world. this isn't the first time i've seen strange lights in this area and i am familiar with the maneuverability of fighter jets and military helicopters and am positive that my sightings were neither of those or any other type of man made aircraft.
content.summary: Saw extremely fast moving lights

content.detailedDescription: At about 11:15 on friday, august 7, i noticed a bright light outside my second floor bedroom window.  a plane was in the distance, and this clearly was not a plane.  a helicopter perhaps?  i stepped out on my balcony to observe this light and as it moved directly overhead and then hovered. 2 more lights appeared on the horizon, seeming to follow this first one.  they moved quickly and silently. now the fist orb seemed to ascend above the cloud cover and vanish.  it was directly overhead by now, so i could clearly see that it was above the clouds and still glowing - and finally it faded.  the other two moved in a similar fashion, following the first light and similarly ascended to the same spot as the fist and disappeared in the cloud cover.  by now, i had called my husband who also saw them.  we discussed the possibilities, thinking they must have been balloons or lanterns with lights or something like that.  we dismissed it, but as my husband left and i looked back out at the horizon, 3 more lights came into view above the neighbors house.  they moved a s similar speed to the first 3, following their path, and they also ascended the same as the others, disappearing in a similar vicinity as the first three.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two sets of 3 glowing amber lights (yellow orange) that moved silently on horizon then vanished over my house.
